name: Bang!
description, num_per_deck: Shoot at someone (lose life point)

name: Missed!
description, num_per_deck: Bang! shot misses

name: Beer
description, num_per_deck: Regain 1 life point

name: Cat Balou
description, num_per_deck: Discard one card (in hand or play) of any player

name: Panic
description, num_per_deck: Steal a card (in hand or play) from a player at distance 1

name: Duel
description, num_per_deck: Challenged player accepts duel by playing Bang!, challenger reciprocates, first to not play a Bang! card loses one point

name: General Store
description, num_per_deck: Flip over one card for each player, choose your cards

name: Indians
description, num_per_deck: All other players discard a Bang! or lose a life point

name: Stagecoach
description, num_per_deck: Draw 2 cards

name: Wells Fargo
description, num_per_deck: Draw 3 cards

name: Saloon
description, num_per_deck: Everyone gets a beer (one life point)

name: Gatling
description, num_per_deck: Shoot one shot at everyone else

name: Jail
description, num_per_deck: Player must 'draw' a heart or lose first two steps of turn

name: Barrel
description, num_per_deck: When shot at, player may 'draw' a heart to dodge shot

name: Dynamite
description, num_per_deck: On next turn, if player 'draws' a 2S-9S, dynamite explodes; if not, it is passed to next player who must 'draw'; explosion costs 3 life points

name: Mustang
description, num_per_deck: Other players see you at distance increased by 1

name: Scope
description, num_per_deck: You see other players at distance decreased by 1

name: Schofield
description, num_per_deck: Range of 2

name: Volcanic
description, num_per_deck: Range of 1, multiple Bang!s per turn

name: Remington
description, num_per_deck: Range of 3

name: Rev Carabine
description, num_per_deck: Range of 4

name: Winchester
description, num_per_deck: Range of 5
